price: Ó sọ pé: “Ẹ̀yin ìjọ mi, dájúdájú èmi ni olùkìlọ̀ pọ́nńbélé fún yín
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
